Uses of ClassificationQualityMetricCalculatorInterface in amuse.nodes.validator.interfaces
 

Classes in amuse.nodes.validator.interfaces that implement ClassificationQualityMetricCalculatorInterface
 class ClassificationQualityMetricCalculator
          Methods which calculate metrics based on classification results and ground truth information should extend this class.
 

Uses of ClassificationQualityMetricCalculatorInterface in amuse.nodes.validator.metrics
 

Classes in amuse.nodes.validator.metrics that implement ClassificationQualityMetricCalculatorInterface
 class AbsoluteError
          Absolute error sums up the differences between labeled and predicted relationships.
 class MeanSquaredError
          The root mean square error calculates the root of the sum of squared differences between labeled and predicted relationships.
 class RelativeError
          Relative error sums up the differences between labeled and predicted relationships and divides the sum by the number of instances.
 

Uses of ClassificationQualityMetricCalculatorInterface in amuse.nodes.validator.metrics.confusionmatrix
 

Classes in amuse.nodes.validator.metrics.confusionmatrix that implement ClassificationQualityMetricCalculatorInterface
 class Accuracy
          The root mean square error calculates the root of the sum of squared differences between labeled and predicted relationships.
 class DiscriminantPower
          The classification algorithm distinguishes poorly between positive and negative examples if Discriminant Power (DP) < 1, limited if DP < 2, fair if DP < 3 and good in other cases
 class FMeasure
          F-Measure metric
 class GeometricMeans
          This metric is high when sensivity and specificity are high and the difference between them is low.
 class Likelihoods
          Higher positive and lower negative likelihood mean better performance on positive and negative classes.
 class Precision
          Precision metric
 class Recall
          Recall metric
 class Specificity
          Specificity metric
 class YoudensIndex
          Youden's index measures the algorithm's ability to correctly label both positive and negative data samples (i.e. generally avoid failures).
 

Uses of ClassificationQualityMetricCalculatorInterface in amuse.nodes.validator.metrics.confusionmatrix.base
 

Classes in amuse.nodes.validator.metrics.confusionmatrix.base that implement ClassificationQualityMetricCalculatorInterface
 class FalseNegatives
          Number of false negatives
 class FalsePositives
          Number of false positives
 class ListOfCorrectlyPredictedInstances
          Returns the list with correctly predicted instances
 class TrueNegatives
          Number of true negatives
 class TruePositives
          Number of true positives
 

Uses of ClassificationQualityMetricCalculatorInterface in amuse.nodes.validator.metrics.correlation
 

Classes in amuse.nodes.validator.metrics.correlation that implement ClassificationQualityMetricCalculatorInterface
 class KendallsTauRankCorrelation
          Kendall's tau rank correlation coefficient is based on the comparison of all possible ordered pairs of instances between ground truth and labeled data.
 class SpearmansRhoRankCorrelation
          Spearman's rank correlation coefficient is a special case of Pearson product-moment correlation coefficient.
 class StandardCorrelationCoefficient
          Correlation coefficient calculates the correlation between labeled and predicted relationships.
